setting.Visibility-of-page-d: When your page is not visible, it is inaccessible to all other users except for you and your team. It will be impossible for your page to be visible. And all your publications will be made inaccessible. When your page is not visible. You will no longer be able to search for it in the search bar.
setting.delete-page-d: Your page will be deleted. No member of the team will be able to recover it. All the publications and comment on your page will be deleted. Your page will no longer exist. This act is irreversible.
setting.message-no-visible: A message will appear on your page informing you that your will be invisible
setting.re-active-page-d: Your page is currently invisible. No one but you is your teams can see it. You can reactivate it at any time.
setting.redirection-to-your-profile: You will be redirected to your profile

Report-Modal-Message.Confirmation-message: Thank you for letting us know. Your comments are important to help us protect our community of Wiinser.  If you have posted the profile of a user or a page, but we believe that it does not violate the community rules, you have other means at your disposal to manage your experience on Espace-Piin's in the best possible way.

1.1: Any description, photographic or written, of sexual acts. Nudity is allowed only if the sexual attributes, primary or secondary, are hidden.
1.2: Hidden" images that are however visible (erection, wet clothing with visible nipple) are not allowed.
1.3: Images of children (defined as "able to stand") naked or in underwear are prohibited.
1.4: Pictures of breastfeeding mothers are allowed as long as the nipples are not visible or the person's anatomy is not further revealed.
1.5: Publishing works of art, whether "hand-drawn, digital or real" representing explicit sexual activity and any form of image or video related to pornography are prohibited.
1.6: Texts, images, audio or video content of shocking sexual acts intended to arouse arousal.
1.7: Sexual content involving minors, non-consensual relationships, or any reprehensible act, whether real or simulated.

2.1: Photos or videos that contain hateful symbols or speech.
2.2: Publications with captions that condone violence or attack a person for who they are.
2.3: Specific threats of bodily harm, theft or vandalism.

3.1: The acceptance of violence as a means of trying to change things
3.2: Content that attempts to provoke a climate of terror in public opinion or that undermines the strength of a government or group.
3.3: Contents that utter or incite the use of terror for ideological purposes.

4.1: Selling or buying a user account
4.2: Sale or purchase of controlled drugs and substances
4.3: Sale or purchase of music, album or playlist
4.5: Products made from endangered or protected species
4.8: Weapons, including firearms, ammunition and explosives, and instructions on how to make weapons (bombs, 3D printed firearms, etc.).

5.1: User accounts where it is reasonably verifiable that the child is under the age of 16.

6.1: Photos or videos showing extreme violence
6.2: Publications advocating violence or attacking a person because of their religion, ethnic origin or sexuality.
6.3: Direct threats of physical harm, theft, vandalism or financial loss.

7.1: Accounts that use the nickname or represent people or organizations they are not.

8.1: Publications encouraging or advocating self-harm, including suicide, scarification and eating disorders.
8.2: Comments identifying victims of self-harm if the content attacks or ridicules them.

9.1: The creation of a "fake profile" based on the first and last name of an existing person...
9.2: Disseminate "public" information about a user without his or her permission and any other information that has been modified or transformed.

TERMS-OF-USE.1-REGISTRATION-d:
Access to certain services is subject to user registration. Registration and access to the site's services are reserved exclusively for capable natural persons, who have completed and validated the registration form available online on the Piin's site, as well as these General Conditions of Use. registration, the user undertakes to provide exact, sincere and up-to-date information on his person and his civil status. The user will also have to regularly check the data concerning him in order to keep its accuracy.

The user must imperatively provide a valid e-mail address, on which the site will send him a confirmation of his registration for his services. An e-mail address cannot be used more than once to register for services through the same account. Only one registration for site services is allowed per natural person. The user is assigned an identifier allowing him to access a space to which access is reserved, in addition to entering his password. The identifier is unique for each user, however the password can be changed online by the user in his Personal Space.
The password is personal and confidential, the user undertakes not to communicate it to third parties. Piin’s reserves in any event, the possibility of refusing a request for subscriptions to the services in the event of non-compliance by the user with the provisions of these General Conditions of Use.
TERMS-OF-USE.2-UNSUBSCRIBE-d: The registered user can at any time request their unsubscription by going to the dedicated page in their personal space. Any unsubscription from the site will be effective, after the user has completed the form provided for this purpose, within the immediate period.
TERMS-OF-USE.3-DELETION-OF-PERSONAL-SPACE-d:
It is made known to the user that the editor reserves the right to delete the personal space of any user who violate the terms of use and particularly in the following cases:

● If the user makes a illegal use of the site
● If the user during the creation of personal space, voluntarily transmit incorrect information to the site
● If the user has not been active on his personal space for at least 5 years.

Dans case where the editor decides to remove the user's personal space for one of these reasons, it can not constitute a harm to the user whose account has been deleted. This deletion does not constitute a waiver of legal proceedings that the publisher may take against the user who has contravened these rules.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-plateform: Espace-Piin’s Inc. is an online media which offers to centralize several functionalities in it in an intuitive and free way for its users. For this, the media is a platform where users can chat and share content with other users. It also hosts a function to listen to music continuously, so that its users can soak up a good atmosphere whatever either the situation and the time. Espace-Piin’s Inc. also hosts a function to watch videos continuously to entertain and educate its users.
TERMS-OF-USE.Access-&-nav-d:
Access to and use of the site are reserved for adults. The publisher will have the right to request proof of the age of the user by any means. The editor implements the technical solutions at his disposal to allow access to the site 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. He can nevertheless at any time suspend, limit or interrupt access to the site or to certain pages of this in order to proceed with updates, modifications of its content or any other actions deemed necessary for the proper functioning of the site.
Connection and navigation on the Espace Piin's site constitute unreserved acceptance of these General Conditions of Use , whatever the technical means of access and the terminals used. These General Conditions of Use apply to any variation or extension of the site on existing or future social and / or community networks managed by Espace Piins Inc.
TERMS-OF-USE.Confidentiality-d: In addition to these Terms and Conditions, the site has a privacy policy which describes how personal data is processed when the user visits the site and how cookies are used. By browsing the site, the user also claims to have read the above privacy policy.
TERMS-OF-USE.Generality-d:
All access methods to the site "www.espace-piins.com" are subject to this privacy policy. Espace Piins Inc is responsible for the personal data collected on the platform. This concerns the use, storage, protection and dissemination of your personal information. Access to Espace Piins is completely free and all the functions of the platform (except the publication of advertising) are not billed.
The editor reserves the right to modify, at any time and without notice, the site and the services as well as these General Conditions of Use, in particular to adapt to new functionalities or the deletion or modification of existing functionalities in the purpose of improving the platform. It is therefore recommended that the user refer to the latest version of the General Conditions of Use before any navigation, accessible at any time on the site. In case of disagreement with the General Conditions of Use, no use of the site can be made by the user.
TERMS-OF-USE.Hyperlinks-d:
The site may contain hypertext links pointing to other websites over which Piin’s has no control. Despite the prior and regular verifications carried out by the publisher, the latter declines all responsibility for the content that it is possible to find on these sites. The publisher authorizes the establishment of hypertext links to any page or document of his site provided that the establishment of these links is not carried out for commercial or advertising purposes. In addition, the prior information of the publisher of the site is necessary before any establishment of hypertext link. Are excluded from this authorization sites disseminating information of an illegal, violent, controversial, pornographic, xenophobic nature or which may affect the sensitivity of the greatest number.
Finally, Piin’s reserves the right to have a hypertext link pointing to its site deleted at any time, if the site considers that it does not comply with its editorial policy. All hypertext external to the platform that is not suggested by the platform publisher is not recommended.
TERMS-OF-USE.Intellectual-property-d:
The structure of the site but also the texts, graphics, images, photographs, sounds, videos and computer applications that compose it are the property of the publisher and are protected as such by the laws in force under intellectual property.

Reproduction, adaptation or partial or total exploitation of the contents, registered trademarks and services offered by the site, by any process whatsoever, without the express prior written authorization of the publisher, are strictly prohibited and may constitute counterfeiting within the meaning of articles L.335-2 et seq. of the Intellectual Property Code. And this, with the exception of the elements expressly designated as free of rights on the site.

Access to the site does not constitute recognition of a right and, in general, does not confer any intellectual property right relating to an element of the site, which remain the exclusive property of the publisher. The user is prohibited from entering data on the site which would modify or which could modify its content or appearance.
TERMS-OF-USE.Responsability-d:
The publisher is only responsible for the content that he himself has edited. The publisher is not responsible for: 

● In the event of problems or technical, IT or accounting failures of the site with any hardware or software 
● Direct or indirect, material or immaterial, foreseeable or unpredictable damage resulting from the use or difficulties of using the site or its services 
● Intrinsic characteristics of the Internet, in particular those relating to the unreliability and the lack of security of the information circulating there 
● Illegal content or activities using its site without its having duly become aware of it within the meaning of the Law with regard to the processing of personal data.

Furthermore, the site cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, and the topicality of the information disseminated there.

The user is responsible for: 
● The protection of its equipment and its manipulation on the platform from a device not belonging to Espace Piins 
● The use he makes of the site or its data 
● If it does not respect the letter or the spirit of these general conditions of use.
TERMS-OF-USE.Responsability-d-extra: By providing content to the service, you grant Piin's a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, transferable sublicense transferable to use this content (including reproduce, distribute, prepare derivative works, the spread and run) in connection with the service and activities Piin's (and its successors and affiliates), including to promote and redistribute Service in whole or in part.
TERMS-OF-USE.Site-management-d:
For the proper management of the site, the publisher may at any time: 

● Suspend, interrupt or limit access to all or part of the site, reserve access to the site or to certain parts of the site, to a specific category of Internet users. 
● Delete all information that could disrupt its operation or that contravenes national or international laws, or the rules of Netiquette. 
● Suspend the site in order to carry out updates. Any desire to modify content on the platform will not be available during maintenance periods.
